name: Gardener
description: A random gardener that works around the house for free. He looks like he is in a hurry.
clue: I don't want to go pointing fingers now, but if I find anything I'll let you know.

name: Nanny
description: The live-in nanny that just submitted her two week notice a week ago. She looks distraught.
clue: I'm so sad! The poor children, without their father! Who would do such a thing?? *sniffle* I have no idea!

name: Butler
description: The family butler that has been in the family for several years. He looks frazzled.
clue: It - it wasn't me!! That's all I know, not me at all! Certainly not!

name: Sergeant
description: The police sergeant in charge of the case and your training.
clue:
The murder happened last night. I think the culprit is 
obvious, but I want to see your investigative chops. It should be 
an easy first case for you.
